function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex relationship between antibiotic concentrations and resistance in wastewater","Impact":"Limited understanding of how antibiotic concentrations impact resistance in wastewater, leading to ineffective mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Conduct further studies to better understand the relationship between antibiotic concentrations and resistance in wastewater","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment technologies to remove antibiotics and antimicrobial resistance genes","People":"Researchers, environmental scientists, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Underexplored areas of antimicrobial resistance genes (ARGs) in wastewater","Impact":"Inadequate knowledge about certain classes of antimicrobial resistance genes in wastewater, leading to unaddressed risks","Mitigation":"Conduct research to investigate other classes of antimicrobial resistance genes in wastewater","Technologies":"High-throughput sequencing for ARG detection, advanced analytical techniques for wastewater analysis","People":"Research scientists, environmental engineers, public health organizations","Owner":"Academic institutions, environmental research organizations"},{"Description":"Seasonal variations in antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) in wastewater","Impact":"Limited understanding of seasonal effects on ARGs in wastewater, potentially leading to increased resistance during certain times of the year","Mitigation":"Conduct studies to characterize seasonal variations in ARGs in wastewater and develop strategies to mitigate seasonal impacts","Technologies":"Real-time PCR for ARG quantification, metagenomic analysis for seasonal ARG profiling","People":"Environmental scientists, public health officials, water treatment professionals","Owner":"Environmental research institutions, government agencies"}]}
